title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the turtleneck comfortable, not itchy, and appreciate its fit, with one noting it hits perfectly at high-waisted jeans.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Sweater
items.body: I love this mock turtleneck! The fit is perfect, flattering without being too tight and the material is soft and high-quality. The cream color is absolutely beautiful and goes with everything. It’s cozy, stylish and perfect for fall. I highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Sybil Coleman Stutts

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wear with EVERYTHING, just RUNS SMALL!
items.body: I have a few of these sweaters and LOVE them. I am 5'7/127 lbs/36 C. I wear a Large in this sweater and it is form fitting. Very flattering, especially with a suede, wool, or jean skirt/pants and boots. I have dressed it up & down and the mock turtle neck is just enough. The sweater is the perfect in-between of thick & thin (the fabric is nice) and this color is true to the ad. Great for Fall. Just size UP! Read more
items.author: Heather C.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater
items.body: This fits perfectly (true to size). It's soft and thick enough to keep you warm but it is not bulky. It's fitted in the best way! I wash it but hang to dry and so far, the quality is what i would expect. I ordered this in camel and am going to order a black one, too! Read more
items.author: Ryan/Sara Woodruff

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very snug fit
items.body: This top is stylish and the fabric is soft & very stretchy. Fit is extremely snug and short, so size up if you have a long torso or want a looser fit. Read more
items.author: Gina M. Hughes

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not my favorite
items.body: So there are pros and cons to this long sleeve. The pros are that the color is beautiful, it's exactly like the picture. I also really like the texture and it's very form fitting/doesn't cling in the wrong places. However, the biggest issue I have with this long sleeve is that it is tiny! I have a short torso and it rides up on me. It would probably try to fit as a crop top on someone with a long torso. It's also not thick at all, it's very thin and you can feel the breeze. Overall, wish I saved the money. Read more
items.author: Shannon H

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fall/winter sweater
items.body: I am 52 I weigh 138 pounds and I bought a medium. It is fitted, and wears so nicely. For the price it’s a great, cool looking sweater. Read more
items.author: Nicole

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars very soft and flattering
items.body: really really like the fit, the length on both the arms and torso, texture was soft and not at all itchy Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars First Impression...
items.body: Only have tried it on, but first impression is that it fits nicely and is incredibly soft. Not a very thick or warm sweater, but stretches nicely. With stretch in mind, I probably could've gotten a size small and it still would have fit, but the medium fits be well, too. It's cute and can be layered easily. :) For reference, I'm 5'5, weigh 118 pounds, with a 32C bust. Read more
items.author: Jurny H.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Sky, Almond, White, Mint, Toffee, Dusty Pink, Dark Blue, Black, Camel, Caramel, Taro. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
